item.title: Video Sales Letter Editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to edit our video sales letter. The video sales letter is a powerful tool that helps us promote our product and increase conversions. Your main responsibility will be to edit the video footage, add relevant graphics and animations, and make sure the overall flow of the video is smooth and engaging. The final video should be around 5 minutes long and convey our message effectively.

    Skills:
    - Video editing
    - Graphic design
    - Animation
    - Storytelling
    - Attention to detail

    Size: Medium
    Duration: A week
    Expertise: Intermediate / Expert

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 15, 2024 16:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, English, Content Writing, Copywriting, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, English, Content Writing, Copywriting, Video Post-Editing

item.title: YouTube Subscribe Monetize - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a Tech Vlog YouTube Channel Growth Specialist to help us increase our subscribers and views. Need Subscribe watch hour monetize expert ,As a specialist, you will be responsible for implementing strategies to grow our channel's audience and engagement. This includes optimizing video titles, descriptions, tags, and thumbnails, as well as improving video search rankings and recommending collaborations with other YouTubers. The ideal candidate should have experience in growing YouTube channels, a deep understanding of YouTube analytics, and knowledge of current trends in the tech vlogging industry.

  Skills required:
  - YouTube channel growth strategies
  - Video optimization
  - YouTube analytics
  - SEO for YouTube
  - Trend analysis
  - Collaboration outreach

  This is a medium-sized project with an expected duration of 1 to 3 months.

  Expertise level: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $7.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 16:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing
Skills: YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing
Country: USA

item.title: YouTube Channel Creation and Editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented freelancer to assist with the creation and editing of a YouTube channel in the royalty niche. This project requires someone with a strong understanding of YouTube's platform and a passion for content creation. The freelancer will be responsible for the following tasks:

- Setting up and optimizing the channel's layout and branding
- Researching and selecting royalty-related topics for video content
- Creating engaging and high-quality videos
- Editing videos to enhance visual appeal and storytelling
- Optimizing video titles, descriptions, and tags for SEO

The ideal candidate should have excellent video editing skills, a creative mindset, and a deep knowledge of the royalty niche. Experience with YouTube's analytics and SEO practices is a plus.

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 15, 2024 16:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, YouTube Development, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube Marketing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, YouTube Development, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube Marketing, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Post Video Editor Car Videography - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking an expert post video editor for an instagram/TikTok Reel, that is fast and good with special effects, such as speed and slow ramps, motion blur, zooms, spins etc.  If you have experience with car Videos this is a bonus.  

30 second clip only with good music choice. (I can provide the music).

Take a look at the style i am looking to achieve further below.

I have around 15 high res MP4 clips taken with a DSLR which i will upload.

This video shouldn't take longer than an hour to edit.

If the quality and final edit is good i have lots of other videos that require doing, so please price accordingly.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5O3Jdaj23Zk
^ Love the quick pans and speed ramping and the reverse ramping with blur etc) Also some of the lighting effects.


https://www.instagram.com/nextwheelstyres/reel/C8JsuD9obuW/
^ Again the special effects, the music and the speed ramping and slowing down etc.


https://www.instagram.com/reel/CbIce0tgxcG/
^ Good music choice and again the pans and editing is excellent.

Budget: $65
Posted On: June 15, 2024 16:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Promotional Video, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Promotional Video, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Video Editor for Wedding Video - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone to create a wedding video from digital video taken at the event. It should be about an hour to 2 hours worth of dozens or more of raw video clips lasting from 10 seconds to as many as 15 or 20 minutes long. Would be looking for 45 minutes to an hour or so video showing the basic flow of the day as well as a highlight video of the bride and groom's dance with cuts to key events throughout the weekend.

Budget: $20

Category: Video Editing
